statements: SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants WHERE location LIKE '%Lake%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(production_statistics, '{"month":"January"}');
SELECT capacity, location FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT location, JSON_LENGTH(production_statistics) AS num_months FROM hydropower_plants;
SELECT location, capacity, production_statistics FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT capacity, location, production_statistics FROM hydropower_plants WHERE location LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(production_statistics, '$.year') = '2021' ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM hydropower_plants GROUP BY location HAVING total_capacity > 5000 ORDER BY total_capacity DESC
SELECT location, capacity, production_statistics FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity < 500 OR location = 'River X' ORDER BY location DESC, capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants;
SELECT location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM plant_statistics WHERE production_year = 2020;
SELECT location, capacity, production_statistics FROM hydropower_plants WHERE location LIKE 'A%';
SELECT location, capacity, production_statistics FROM hydropower_plants ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants
SELECT location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM hydropower_plants GROUP BY location
SELECT p.location, ps.production_year, ps.electricity_produced FROM hydropower_plants p JOIN plant_statistics ps ON p.location = ps.plant_id
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plant_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM hydropower_plant_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, address FROM hydropower_plant_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plant_capacity WHERE capacity_mw >= 100 ORDER BY capacity_mw DESC;

SELECT pp.production_id, pp.plant_id, pp.production_date, PCR.capacity_mw FROM hydropower_production_statistics pp JOIN hydropower_plant_capacity PCR ON pp.plant_id = PCR.plant_id WHERE PCR.capacity_mw > 200 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plant_locations LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM hydropower_plant_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, address, capacity_mw FROM hydropower_plant_locations JOIN hydropower_plant_capacity ON hydropower_plant_locations.location_id = hydropower_plant_capacity.location_id;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_production_statistics WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT p.production_id, p.production_mwh, c.capacity_mw FROM hydropower_production_statistics p JOIN hydropower_plant_capacity c ON p.plant_id = c.plant_id ORDER BY production_mwh DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT plant_id, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM production_statistics GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM plant_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT location, capacity FROM hydropower_plants ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location, production_statistics FROM hydropower_plants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM plant_capacity pc JOIN production_statistics ps ON pc.plant_id = ps.plant_id WHERE pc.capacity > 500 AND ps.production_amount > 1000;
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM plant_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plant_locations;
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM hydropower_plant_locations;
SELECT id, capacity, capacity_units FROM hydropower_plant_capacity ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT owner_name FROM hydropower_plant_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT type_name FROM hydropower_plant_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plant_locations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM hydropower_plant_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT location, capacity, capacity_units FROM hydropower_plant_locations JOIN hydropower_plant_capacity ON hydropower_plant_locations.id = hydropower_plant_capacity.plant_id;
SELECT h.location, p.owner_name FROM hydropower_plant_locations h JOIN hydropower_plant_owners p ON h.id = p.owner_id WHERE h.location LIKE '%River%';
SELECT hpl.location AS plant_location, hpt.type_name AS plant_type FROM hydropower_plant_locations hpl JOIN hydropower_plant_types hpt ON hpl.id = hpt.type_id ORDER BY plant_type ASC;
